segments.lesson_summary: Summary of segment 4: The Ministry of Education, the Department for Planning and Developing Curriculum in all sectors - a math curriculum for 3rd grade examples and explanations. Subjects: Large Numbers, Problem Solving in Multiplication (10,000), Gradual Teaching of Large Numbers (Hundreds, Thousands, Tens of Thousands), Decimal Structure (1/10). Representing Three-Digit Numbers Using Visual Aids - for example, showing 10,000 on square paper: a square with a half-meter side has 10,000 squares with sides half a centimeter.
